  • Single_Photons.sp_MAIN module

Single_Photons.sp_MAIN module¶

CT_MOD(lock)¶

Operates the two channel coincidence timer and sends time data back to the connected client

Parameters

lock (multiprocessing.Lock) – Thread lock to ensure this thread can acquire Io resources without contention with other threads

DD_IDELAY(channel, tap, stage)¶

Operates the input delay hardware module

Parameters

  • channel (int) – Channel to set the delay on

  • tap (int) – The delay line tap of the top stage

  • stage (int) – The number of delay line stages below the top stage that are fully active

PG_MOD(params)¶

Operates the signal generator on the fabric

Parameters

params (dict) –

A JSON string consisting of a serialized dictionary with keys of type str containing

int

Channel with key ‘ch’

int or bool

Channel enabled (1 or 0) (true or false) with key ‘enable’

float

Frequency of channel in Hz with key ‘frequency’

float

Duty cycle of channel (0-1) or pulse width in milliseconds with key ‘dc’

float

Delay of channel in seconds with key ‘del’

bool

A boolean stating whether the supplied float in DC is either a duty cycle or pulse width. Key: ‘dcm’

ST_MOD(lock)¶

Operates the single channel inter rising edge timer and sends time data to the connected client.

Parameters

lock (multiprocessing.Lock) – Thread lock to ensure this thread can acquire Io resources without contention with other threads

TT_MOD(time, lock)¶

Operates the time tagger and sends time information to the connected client

Parameters

  • time (float) – The time out in seconds of the time tagger

  • lock (multiprocessing.Lock) – Thread lock to ensure this thread can acquire Io resources without contention with other threads

counter(window, mode, lock)¶

Starts and operates the pulse counter and sends counts to client connected to socket

Parameters

  • window (float) – The time window to count for (has no effect if the mode is 2)

  • mode (int) – The mode the counter is operating in, 0 - Manually started and coutns for window, 1 - Started by external trigger and counts for window, 2 - Started by external trigger and counts till stop trigger is pulsed.

  • lock (multiprocessing.Lock) – Lock to ensure all IO operations are thread safe.

run()¶
sendToHost(data, l)¶

Send the specified string data to the client connected to the socket

Parameters

  • data (str) – Data to send

  • l (multiprocessing.Lock) – Thread lock
